step1.title: Access the platform
step1.description: Create your account in 2 minutes. Simply log in with your email to get started.

step2.title: Customize your messages
step2.description: Create your SMS templates for each delivery stage and your marketing campaigns.

step3.title: Automate and analyze
step3.description: Let AI handle automatic sending and consult your statistics in real time.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs

questions.question: Can I try for free?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer a permanent free subscription with no commitment. No credit card required to start.

questions.question: Which carriers are supported?
questions.answer: We natively support Yalidine, Guepex and Maystro. Other carriers will be added soon based on your requests.

questions.question: Can I customize SMS messages?
questions.answer: Yes, absolutely! You can customize each message for each delivery status and for your marketing campaigns with dynamic variables.

questions.question: How does automatic tracking work?
questions.answer: Once your carrier is connected, the system automatically checks the status of each package and sends a personalized SMS to your customer at each status change.

questions.question: How to manage multiple stores?
questions.answer: With a single account, you can manage multiple stores. Each store can have its own SMS settings and carriers configured independently.

cta.title: Ready to boost your sales?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of e-commerce merchants who trust SMS Pro

footer.description: The all-in-one solution to automate your SMS and boost your sales.
